==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{m|ja|成田||Narita; a place name in Japan}} + {{m|ja|空港||airport}}.

# [[Narita]] [[airport]]. ''Often written as ''{{ja-r|成田国際空港|^なりた ^こくさい ^くうこう|gloss=Narita International Airport}}, or simply as {{ja-r|成田|^なりた|gloss=Narita}}.''
